source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT orders.Order_id as order_id,
	orders.Customer_id as customer_id,
	orders.Order_status as order_status,
	orders.Due_date,
	orders.Created_date,
	orders.Order_total,
	orders.Line_subtotal,
	orders.Shipping_total,
	orders.Tax_total,
	orders.Billing_email,
	orders.Billing_phone,
	orders.Billing_firstname,
	orders.Billing_lastname,
	orders.Billing_address_1, 
	orders.Billing_address_2, 
	orders.Billing_city,
	orders.Billing_state,
	orders.Billing_postcode,
	orders.Shipping_firstname,
	orders.Shipping_lastname,
	orders.Shipping_address_1,
	orders.Shipping_address_2,
	orders.Shipping_city,
	orders.Shipping_state,
	orders.shipping_provider,
	( SELECT products.ProductName, 	products.SKU,	products.Price,	products.Qty, 	products.SubTotal
		from dbo.All_OrderItems products
		where products.Co_num = orders.Order_id
		for JSON AUTO ) as products
FROM [dbo].All_Orders orders
